info.title: Pogodoc API
info.description: API for Pogodoc document and template management service. Provides endpoints for rendering documents, managing templates, generating previews, and handling API tokens.

get.description: Initializes template creation by generating a unique ID and providing a presigned URL for template ZIP upload. Sets unfinished tag for tracking incomplete templates.

put.description: Updates template content, handles S3 storage cleanup for old content, updates template metadata in Strapi, and manages preview files. Removes unfinished tags after successful update.

post.description: Finalizes template creation by saving template info to Strapi, copying preview files to permanent storage, and creating template index. Removes unfinished tag upon completion.

delete.description: Deletes a template from Strapi and associated S3 storage. Removes all associated files and metadata.

post.description: Extracts contents from an uploaded template ZIP file and stores individual files in the appropriate S3 storage structure.
Creates both PNG and PDF preview files for template visualization. Generates previews in parallel and returns URLs for both formats.

get.description: Generates a presigned URL for template access. Used for downloading template files from S3 storage.
Retrieves the template index.html file from S3 storage. Used for rendering the template in the browser.

post.description: Uploads the template index.html file to S3 storage. Used for rendering the template in the browser.
Creates a new template by duplicating an existing template's content and metadata. Includes copying preview files and template index.
Creates a new render job with a unique ID, sets up S3 storage for template and data files, and generates presigned upload URLs if needed. Requires subscription check.
Takes a previously initialized job, updates its status to in-progress, and triggers the rendering process using Puppeteer. Can optionally wait for render completion.
Generates a preview by creating a single-page render job, processing it immediately, and returning the output URL. Used for template visualization.
Combines initialization and rendering in one step. Creates a job, uploads template/data directly, starts rendering, and adds the document to Strapi. Requires subscription check.

get.description: Fetches detailed job information from S3 storage including job status, template ID, target format, and output details if available.

delete.description: Invalidates an API token by storing it in the deleted tokens S3 bucket, preventing future use of the token for authentication.
